org.esupportail.commons.web.beans
Interface Paginator<E>

Type Parameters:
E - the class of the results
All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractHibernatePaginator, AbstractHibernateQueryPaginator, AbstractPaginator, HibernateFixedQueryPaginator, ListPaginator
public interface Paginator<E>
extends java.io.Serializable

The interface of paginators, used to display displaying results from a large result set over a number of pages without retrieving all the items from the database. Adapted from http://blog.hibernate.org/cgi-bin/blosxom.cgi/2004/08/14#fn.html and http://blog.hibernate.org/cgi-bin/pollxn.cgi?storypath=/Gavin%20King/pagination.html
